title: Kylie Jenner hides behind her bodyguard as she arrives at club to reunite with Tyga
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner has raised speculation once again as she partied in the same club as ex Tyga following her visit to his recording studio at 2am following her split with Travis.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, 22, was blasted earlier this week for visiting the rapper's studio in the early hours of the morning, but said she was dropping off some friends, although the beauty mogul insisted she was innocent.

On Saturday night Kylie was seen shielding behind her bodyguard as she made her way to West Hollywood club Hyde Lounge with her girls at around 1am.

The reality TV star made her debut in a tight fitting pink mini dress as she wore a huge smile while walking into the club from her car.

And Tyga arrived to the club separately in his custom red Ferrari, accompanied by his friend Alexander Edwards - who is Amber Rose's boyfriend.

(Image: Photographer Group/MEGA)

The chart topping rapper was pictured wearing a baseball cap, a stripy long sleeved T-shirt and a huge diamond necklace before he left the club at around 2am.

Her ex's appearance comes after he was spotted with a mystery woman on Friday as they attended Universal Studios Halloween Horror Nights haunted theme park in California, as reported by Daily Mail .

Billionaire Kylie wasn't alone on her night out, she was joined by her sister Khloe Kardashian who enjoyed a night of partying following her split with Tristan Thompson in February.

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: Instagram)

Khloe looked incredible as she donned a short blonde bob and chic black blazer for the night out, teamed with gold statement rings and neon eyeshadow.

The sisters' night out comes days after Kylie insisted her 2am visit to Tyga's studio was completely innocent as she took to Twitter .

(Image: Kylie Jenner/Instagram)

The Kylie Cosmetics owner wrote: "The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no "2am date with Tyga". You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at."

And the link up between the two raised eyebrows as it came just the day after Kylie broke up with her baby daddy Travis Scott after two years together.
description: The billionaire appeared to be enjoying a night out at the same club as her ex Tyga just days after her secret visit to his recording studio
